snippet: A day after the Fed chairman seemed to convince investors that the stimulus wasn’t ending soon, the Dow and the S.& P. 500 closed at nominal highs.
abstract: Stocks rise again following announcement that Federal Reserve will continue supporting economy.
lead_paragraph: A day after the Fed chairman seemed to convince investors that the stimulus wasn’t ending soon, the Dow and the S.& P. 500 closed at nominal highs.

headline.main: Rally Continues, Fanned by the Fed
headline.print_headline: Rally Continues, Fanned by the Fed
